attributes.action: Review and increase sentences for people who cause death by dangerous driving
attributes.additional_details: By increasing the sentences for these offenders, it sends a strong message that such behavior will not be tolerated and serves as a deterrent for others to drive more responsibly. Ultimately, this can help make the roads safer for everyone.
attributes.background: Stricter penalties should be imposed on drivers who are responsible for causing death due to dangerous driving. This measure aims to ensure that those who engage in reckless behavior behind the wheel face severe consequences for their actions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657289
